
# OHLCV 1m Signal API (Docker)

Este projeto empacota a API FastAPI para prever COMPRA/VENDA 1 minuto à frente com indicadores técnicos.

## Subir com Docker Compose (recomendado)

```bash
cd ohlcv_api_docker
docker compose up --build -d
```

A API sobe em: http://localhost:8000
Documentação: http://localhost:8000/docs

## Teste rápido

```bash
curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/signal   -H "Content-Type: application/json"   -d '{
    "symbol":"BTCUSDT",
    "timeframe":"1m",
    "timestamp":[1757177940,1757178000,1757178060,1757178120,1757178180,1757178240,1757178300,1757178360,1757178420,1757178480,1757178540,1757178600,1757178660,1757178720,1757178780,1757178840,1757178900,1757178960,1757179020,1757179080,1757179140,1757179200,1757179260,1757179320,1757179380,1757179440,1757179500,1757179560,1757179620,1757179680,1757179740,1757179800,1757179860,1757179920,1757179980,1757180040,1757180100,1757180160,1757180220,1757180280,1757180340,1757180400,1757180460,1757180520,1757180580,1757180640,1757180700,1757180760,1757180820,1757180880,1757180940,1757181000,1757181060,1757181120,1757181180,1757181240,1757181300,1757181360,1757181420,1757181480],
```

## Build/Run sem compose

```bash
docker build -t ohlcv-signal-api:latest .
docker run --rm -p 8000:8000 --name ohlcv ohlcv-signal-api:latest
```

Pronto! Acesse http://localhost:8000/docs
